tool_description: An API that allows users to be stored, retrieved, and deleted from a database.
name: Node Express API Tutorial
title: Node Express API Tutorial

api_list.name: Get Specific User
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the user with the specified ID.

api_list.name: Get All Users
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all users stored in the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://node-express-api-tutorial.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "node-express-api-tutorial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Store A User to the Database
api_list.description: This endpoint will add a user to the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://node-express-api-tutorial.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "node-express-api-tutorial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
